It's a feature
Has anyone got this 2 work? Plus, a public server would be nice I anyone's hosting because Queril, I can't connect to yours.

Hey guys, Harv here,

http://prntscr.com/20l8oi TheMattDennis16 and I are trying to get it working and are failing spectacularly. Clean installs, running server as admin, port forwarding via Hamachi on a network that we know works.

Any ideas?

Also, can anyone actually post evidence of this mod/ plugin working? Have yet to see some.

Thanks,

HOCgaming

Probably provider's ****.

Try direct connection on ip 188.134.119.223:2525 (most likely wont work)

ping on the IP returns a timeout. Unable to connect the server, by any way.

ping on the IP returns a timeout. Unable to connect the server, by any way.

Fixed the localization bug affecting you SolarLiner (& Andrenetor96)--just download a fresh copy from SpacePort

Hey guys, Harv here,

http://prntscr.com/20l8oi TheMattDennis16 and I are trying to get it working and are failing spectacularly. Clean installs, running server as admin, port forwarding via Hamachi on a network that we know works.

Any ideas?

Also, can anyone actually post evidence of this mod/ plugin working? Have yet to see some.

Thanks,

HOCgaming

Hey Harv!

Sounds like you have another server running on this machine (KMP currently tries to snag port 80 for reporting general server info, but I'll be changing that in a future update since this is a common problem)--try changing the httpPort setting and see if that helps?
Harv, will that do?

Awww yea! A good mod on meh birthday!!

Ima take this as a public gift.

Hay, im running a server come and fool around with me if you want. ip: 82.16.1.31

and port: 2076
